entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the morning then rising.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the morning then rising. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
